IVisualizationClient.GetClientName (METH)
IVisualizationClient.GetClientName (METH)
Â¶
METHOD GetClientName : STRING
Returns the name of the given client if specified in the according configuration of
the client which is dependent on the concrete type of client.
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Comment
Return
GetClientName
STRING
Output
xIsValid

TRUE
: The client name is configured
